DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine usefulness CCTA ( Coronary Computed Tomography Angiography ) emergency room set diagnose predict outcome patient chest pain low moderate risk heart disease . And also determine use CCTA ( Coronary Computed Tomography Angiography ) cost effective ( cost less ) current standard care treatment . To determine patient present emergency room w/low moderate probability ACS ( Acute Coronary Syndrome ) prefer CCTA ( coronary compute tomography angiography ) -based care compare standard algorithm base care .
DOC.brief_title: Coronary Computed Tomography ( CT ) Angiography Versus Standard Therapy Emergency Room
DOC.criteria: 25 year age old Experiencing chest pain Pregnant At high risk ACS ( Acute Coronary Syndrome )
